description.english: Rescue Chestnut, the sheep.
description.german: Rette Chestnut, das Schaf.
description.spanish: Rescata a Chestnut, la oveja.
description.brazilian: Resgate Chestnut, a ovelha.

description.english: Rescue Melody, the mermaid.
description.german: Rette Melody, die Meerjungfrau.
description.spanish: Rescata a Melody, la sirena.
description.brazilian: Resgate Melody, a sereia.

description.english: Rescue Kalipu, the reindeer.
description.german: Rette Kalipu, das Rentier.
description.spanish: Rescata a Kalipu, la reno.
description.brazilian: Resgate Kalipu, a rena.

description.english: Rescue Luno, the sloth.
description.german: Rette Luno, das Faultier.
description.spanish: Rescata a Luno, el perezoso.
description.brazilian: Resgate Luno, o bicho-preguiça.

description.english: Rescue Leon, the knight.
description.german: Rette Leon, den Ritter.
description.spanish: Rescata a Leon, el caballero.
description.brazilian: Resgate Leon, o cavaleiro.

description.english: Rescue Celosia, the fairy.
description.german: Rette Celosia, die Fee.
description.spanish: Rescata a Celosia, la hada.
description.brazilian: Resgate Celosia, a fada.

description.english: Achieve the normal ending.
description.german: Erreiche das normale Ende.
description.spanish: Logra el final normal.
description.brazilian: Chegue ao final normal.

description.english: Achieve the true ending.
description.german: Erreiche das wahre Ende.
description.spanish: Logra el final verdadero.
description.brazilian: Chegue ao final verdadeiro.

description.english: Rescue all 6 friends.
description.german: Rette alle 6 Freunde in einem Spieldurchlauf.
description.spanish: Rescata a los 6 amigos en una partida.
description.brazilian: Resgate todos os 6 amigos.

description.english: Complete a world without taking damage.
description.german: Überlebe eine Welt ohne Schaden zu nehmen.
description.spanish: Sobrevive un mundo sin recibir daño.
description.brazilian: Complete um mundo sem receber dano.

description.english: Collect all 5 Star Gems in a world.
description.german: Finde alle 5 Sternjuwelen in einer Welt.
description.spanish: Consigue las 5 Gemas Estrella en un mundo.
description.brazilian: Colete todas as 5 Gemas-Estrelas em um mundo.

description.english: Get one of each type of candy in a world.
description.german: Hol dir eine von jeder Süssigkeitssorte in einer Welt.
description.spanish: Consigue uno de cada tipo de dulce en un mundo.
description.brazilian: Consiga um tipo de cada doce em um mundo.

description.english: Defeat 50 enemies using the key.
description.german: Besiege 50 Gegner mit dem Schlüssel.
description.spanish: Derrota a 50 enemigos usando la llave.
description.brazilian: Derrote 50 inimigos usando a chave.

description.english: Get 25 big candy items.
description.german: Hol dir 25 grosse Süssigkeiten.
description.spanish: Coge 25 dulces grandes.
description.brazilian: Consiga 25 doces grandes.

description.english: Register a score of over 22000 points.
description.german: Trage eine Punktzahl höher als 22000 ein.
description.spanish: Inscribe un puntaje mayor a 22000.
description.brazilian: Registre uma pontuação maior do que 22000 pontos.

description.english: Rescue Chestnut while in Nightmare Mode.
description.german: Rette Chestnut in der Alptraum-Schwierigkeit.
description.spanish: Rescata a Chestnut en dificultad Pesadilla.
description.brazilian: Resgate Chestnut enquanto está no Modo Pesadelo.
